effect.simplyskills.lightning_attunement: 每层效果提供2%的闪电法术强度。
effect.simplyskills.precision.desc: 每层效果提高2%的法术暴击伤害和暴击几率。
effect.simplyskills.death_mark.desc: 每层减少实体25%的抗性和治疗效果。
effect.simplyskills.marksman.desc: 使你的下一个满蓄力的远程攻击发射一支神射手箭，并使目标陷入死亡标记。
text.autoconfig.simplyskills.option.cler:
Enable/Disable the ability to unlock this specialisation.
Does not retroactively lock the specialisation if already unlocked.
text.skills.fervour.title: §7§a[热忱]§7
text.skills.initiateGambit.title: §7§a[赌注]
text.skills.initiateGambit.description: §7你的法术伤害减少§c25% §f[x]§7，但你的法术暴击伤害 §a+75% §f[x]§7。
text.skills.pathWayfarer.title: 分 支 - §b冒 险 家
text.skills.initiateSlowfall.title: §7§a[先天性缓降]§7
text.skills.initiateSlowfall.description: §7当你从高处坠落时，你会获得缓降效果。
text.skills.fervour.description: §7击杀敌人后，你会短暂获得急迫效果。
text.skills.wayfarerStealth.title: §7§a[隐匿]§7
text.skills.wayfarerStealth.description:
蹲下时获得隐匿效果。

§f（隐匿）§7使你融入阴影中，完全避开怪物的侦测。造成伤害或受到伤害会移除隐匿效果。
text.skills.wayfarerSneak.title: §7§a[潜行]§7
text.skills.wayfarerSneak.description:
蹲下时获得速度提升。当你处于隐匿状态时潜行，你会获得逐渐增加的神力层数。

§f（神力）§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7攻击伤害。
text.skills.wayfarerReflexive.title: §7§a[反射]§7
text.skills.wayfarerReflexive.descriptio:
当你的隐匿被强制破除时，你有几率触发盗贼闪避大师的特性技能。

当你的隐匿效果被攻击破坏，会获得神力和射术。

§f（射术）§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7远程伤害。

§f（神力）§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7攻击伤害。
text.skills.wayfarerUnseen.title: §7§a[隐形]§7
text.skills.wayfarerUnseen.description:
§7在装填弩时，获得短暂的隐匿效果。
如果你已获得隐匿效果，则会获得射术。

§f（射术）§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7的远程伤害。
text.skills.wayfarerGuarding.title: §7§a[守护]§7
text.skills.wayfarerGuarding.description:
§7当你的副手持有弩时，你会周期性地获得屏障。

§f（屏障）§7你下一次受到的伤害将被完全抵消。
text.skills.wayfarerQuickfire.title: §7§a[快速射击]§7
text.skills.wayfarerQuickfire.descriptio:
§当使用弩时，快速连续发射已装填的箭矢，可叠加射术。

§f（射术）§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7远程伤害。
text.skills.initiateNullification.title: §7§a[破势]§7
text.skills.initiateNullification.descri: §7周期性地从附近的敌对生物身上移除增益效果。
text.skills.initiateEmpower.title: §7§a[强化]§7
text.skills.initiateEmpower.description:
§7施放法术时有几率获得一层共鸣效果。

§f（共鸣）§7 根据法术所属的魔法流派，每层效果§a+2% §f[x]§7法术伤害。
text.skills.initiateAttuned.title: §7§a[共振]§7
text.skills.initiateAttuned.description:
§7当你拥有5层或以上的共鸣效果时，会定期将它们转化为精准效果。

§f（精准）§7 每层效果§a+2% §f[x]§7法术暴击伤害和暴击率。
text.skills.initiateLightningRod.title: §7§a[避雷针]§7
text.skills.initiateLightningRod.descrip:
§7在风暴期间，你会定期获得一层雷电共鸣效果。

§f（雷电共鸣）§7 每层效果§a+2% §f[x]§7雷电法术伤害。
text.skills.initiateEldritchEnfeeblement: §7你的法术伤害§a+5% §f[x]，但你的移动速度降低§c10% §f[x]§7。
text.skills.initiateHasty.title: §7§a[急躁]§7
text.skills.initiateHasty.description:
§7你的移动速度§a+15% §f[x]§7，但当你受到伤害时，你会被施加定身效果。

§f（定身）§7 当实体试图移动时，会大幅降低其速度并造成伤害。
text.skills.initiatePerilousPrecision.de: §7你的法术暴击率§a+5% §f[x]§7，但你的最大生命值降低§c15% §f[x]§7。
text.skills.cleric.title: §7§a[神圣]§7
text.skills.cleric.description: §7定期清除附近盟友身上的负面效果。
text.skills.cleansing.title: §7§a[净化]§7
text.skills.rangerReveal.title: §7§a[揭示]§7
text.skills.rangerTamer.title: §7§a[驯兽师]§7
text.skills.rangerTamer.description: §7当你的宠物靠近你时，它们会获得生命恢复和抗性效果。
text.skills.rangerBonded.title: §7§a[羁绊]§7
text.skills.rangerBonded.description: §7当宠物生命值高于30%时，且你的生命值低于30%时，它们会与你交换生命值。
text.skills.rangerTrained.title: §7§a[受训]§7
text.skills.rangerTrained.description: §7当宠物附近，且至少有70%的生命值时，它们会获得力量和速度提升。
text.skills.rangerIncognito.title: §7§a[隐匿]§7
text.skills.rangerIncognito.description: §7当你的宠物在你附近并且你获得了隐匿效果时，它们也会隐身。
text.skills.rogueBackstab.title: §7§a[背刺]§7
text.skills.berserkerSwordMastery.descri: §7当你在主手持剑时，你会获得迅捷。
text.skills.rogueBackstab.description:
§7从敌人背后攻击会使他们陷入虚弱状态。

此外，当你接近虚弱的敌人时，你有机会短时间内获得隐匿效果
text.skills.warriorHeavyArmorMastery.des: §7当你的护甲值高于15时，你有几率在受到伤害时获得力量效果。
text.skills.warriorMediumArmorMastery.de: §7当你的护甲值低于15时，你有几率在受到伤害时获得伤害吸收效果。
text.skills.warriorSpellbreaker.title: §7§a[破法者]§7
text.skills.warriorSpellbreaker.descript:
§7当你受到伤害时，你有机会短时间内获得破法效果。

§f（破法）§7 会使敌方的法术弹射物在靠近你时爆炸。
text.skills.warriorGoliath.title: §7§a[落地冲击]§7
text.skills.warriorGoliath.description:
§7当你从高处坠落时，获得震地者效果。

§f（震地者）§7 使你着地时对周围的敌人造成伤害和击退。这个伤害与你的护甲值成正比。
text.skills.warriorHeavyWeight.title: §7§a[重量级人物]§7
text.skills.warriorHeavyWeight.descripti: §7你的震地者效果得到增强，使它们根据你在空中的时间长短造成额外的伤害。
text.skills.warriorBound.title: §7§a[跳跃提升]§7
text.skills.warriorBound.description: §7激活震地者后，你会短时间内获得跳跃提升效果。
text.skills.warriorDeathDefy.title: §7§a[死亡蔑视]§7
text.skills.warriorDeathDefy.description:
§7当生命值低时，你会根据剩余的生命值百分比获得生命恢复和耗竭效果。

§f（耗竭）§7每层都会使你的近战攻击、移动速度和攻击速度降低§c1% §f[x]§7。
text.skills.warriorFrenzy.title: §7§a[天生粗笨]§7
text.skills.warriorFrenzy.description:
§7获得75%的近战伤害增加，但每次击中敌人时，你都会获得一层耗竭效果。

§f（耗竭）§7每层都会使你的近战攻击、移动速度和攻击速度降低§c1% §f[x]§7。
text.skills.warriorCarnage.title: §7§a[定身]§7
text.skills.warriorCarnage.description:
§7当狂怒或耗竭层数达到或超过75层时，获得生命提升和定身光环效果。

§f（定身光环）§7 会周期性地使附近的敌人陷入定身状态。

§f（定身）§7 当实体试图移动时，会大幅降低速度并造成伤害。
text.skills.warriorTwinstrike.title: §7§a[多重打击]§7
text.skills.warriorTwinstrike.descriptio: §7你的近战攻击有机会打出两次。在生命提升效果下，几率将翻倍。
text.skills.warriorSwordfall.title: §7§a[审判]§7

text.skills.berserkerSwordMastery.title: §7§a[剑术大师]§7

text.skills.berserkerSwordMasterySkilled:
§7当你单手持剑时，你会获得神力。

§f（神力）§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7攻击伤害。

text.skills.berserkerAxeMasteryProficien: §7当你在主手持斧时，你会获得增强的力量 II。
text.skills.berserkerAxeMasterySkilled.d: §7当你在主手持斧时，你会获得超强的力量 III。

text.skills.berserkerIgnorePain.descript: §7当你的生命值下降到40%以下时，你会获得抗性提升 I。
text.skills.berserkerIgnorePainProficien: §7当你的生命值下降到40%以下时，你会获得抗性提升 II。
text.skills.berserkerIgnorePainSkilled.d: §7当你的生命值下降到40%以下时，你会获得抗性提升 III。
text.skills.berserkerRecklessness.title: §7§a[鲁莽]§7
text.skills.berserkerRecklessness.descri:
§7当你的生命值上升到70%以上时，你会被虚弱效果影响。

此外，当你造成或受到伤害时，会获得一层狂怒效果。

§f（狂怒）§7 每层提供§a+0.5% §f[x]§7近战伤害、攻击速度和承受伤害，最多可以堆叠100层。 当狂怒层数超过25层时，你会迅速失去耗竭的层数。
text.skills.berserkerChallenge.title: §7§a[挑战]§7
text.skills.berserkerChallenge.descripti: §7击杀敌人所能获得的急迫效果额外获得一层。
text.skills.berserkerExploit.title: §7§a[压榨]§7
text.skills.berserkerExploit.description: §7击中被定身的敌人会使他们陷入虚弱状态。

text.skills.bulwarkShieldMasteryProficie: §7当你持盾时，你会获得虚弱和增强的抗性提升 I效果。
§7当你持盾时，你会获得虚弱和增强的抗性提升 II效果。
text.skills.bulwarkRebuke.title: §7§a[谴责]§7
text.skills.bulwarkRebuke.description: §725%的几率在格挡时使攻击者陷入虚弱状态。

§f（敏捷）§7 每层提供§a+5% §f[x]§7攻击速度，移动速度，法术施放速度和远程伤害。

§7在隐匿效果下，你的背部攻击会造成死亡标记。

§f（死亡标记）§7 每层减少被偷袭者§c25% §f[x]§7抗性和治疗效果。

text.skills.rogueRecovery.description: §7当你获得隐匿时，你也会获得生命恢复效果。
text.skills.rogueShadowVeil.title: §7§a[影壳]§7
text.skills.rogueShadowVeil.description: §7在隐匿效果下，你会周期性地获得增加的抗性。
text.skills.rogueDeflection.title: §7§a[偏转力]§7
text.skills.rogueDeflection.description: §7当双持武器时§f（斧头除外）§7，闪避大师被动技能的基础闪避几率增加10%。

§7在隐匿效果下施放法术时，你会获得几层铸法效果，持续几秒钟。

text.skills.initiateSpellcloak.descripti:
§7施放法术时，只要你当前没有被揭露，会获得短暂的隐身效果。

§f（隐匿）§7 使你融入阴影中，完全避免怪物的侦测。造成或受到伤害会移除隐匿效果。
text.skills.initiateOverload.title: §7§a[超载]§7
text.skills.initiateOverload.description:
§7施放法术时，你会获得一层超载效果，持续短时间。

§f（超载）§7 每层提供§a+45% §f[x]§7法术暴击伤害和§a+10% §f[x]§7法术暴击率。当超过5层时，你会超载，对自己和附近的敌人造成大量伤害。

这种伤害是根据你的最大生命值和灵魂法术强度来计算的。

§7施放法术时，你会获得一层神力效果。偶尔也会获得一层铸法效果。

§f(神力)§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7攻击伤害。

text.skills.wizardPath.title: 分 支 - §b巫 师§7

§7
在附近的敌人头上召唤流星。

§7施放§6[流星雨]§7现在会给你10层流星之怒效果。

text.skills.wizardSignatureIceComet.desc:
§7
召唤一个冰彗星，对大范围内的敌人造成伤害并减速。

text.skills.wizardSignatureIceCometDamag: §7§6[冰彗星]§7现在更大并造成更高的伤害和击退效果。
§7§6[冰彗星]§7现在更大并造成极高的伤害和击退效果。
text.skills.wizardSignatureStaticDischar: 特性技能：§6[静电荷] §7

§7
释放一个高伤害的电气放电，对你的目标造成虚弱效果。

§8[需要附近有目标]

§a35秒冷却时间§7
§f [球状闪电]

§6[静电荷]§7不再跳跃，而是召唤一个缓慢移动的闪电球，定期对附近的敌人释放电气。

所有通常会在跳跃时激活的被动技能，现在会在闪电球对敌人释放电气时激活。
§f[弹跳闪电]
§7你的§6[静电荷]§7现在可以在附近的敌人之间跳跃。
§f[弹跳闪电 +]
§7你的§6[静电荷]§7在消失之前可以多跳几次。
§f[弹跳闪电 ++]
§7你的§6[静电荷]§7在消失之前可以跳跃更多次。
§f[急速]
§7每当§6[静电荷]§7跳跃或者施放时，你有5%的几率获得迅捷。
§f[急速 +]
§7每当§6[静电荷]§7跳跃或者施放时，你有10%的几率获得迅捷。
§7每当§6[静电荷]§7跳跃或者施放时，你有15%的几率获得迅捷。
§f[闪电球]

§7除了获得迅捷之外，你还有几率召唤一个闪电球，它会在你周围不规则地旋转，对它经过的敌人造成伤害。

对于你附近的每一个闪电球，获得一层灵魂震荡。

§f(灵魂震荡)§7 每层可以为你提供§a+1 §f[x]§7灵魂和雷电法术强度。
§f[电极]
§7你的闪电球命中现在可以触发施法效果，比如法术回响。

§7施放§6[奥术箭]§7时，你获得10层奥术射弹效果。

text.skills.wizardSignatureArcaneBoltGre: §7你现在施放一枚§6[高级奥术箭]§7，造成更高的伤害和穿透。

§6[闪避]§7现在还赋予你10层刀刃风暴效果。

§7你现在获得20层刀刃风暴效果，投掷频率增加，但伤害降低。
§7杀死敌人时获得两层刀刃风暴效果。

§7每击中一个敌人，就获得一层剑风效果，最多20层。

§f（剑风） §7使匕首围绕着你旋转，对附近的敌人造成伤害。

每层剑风都增加其攻击频率，并为你提供1%额外的闪避几率。

§7剑风现在有几率在击中时虹吸红心。

§f（剑刃风暴）§7 使你周围旋转飞刀，对附近的敌人造成伤害。

剑刃风暴的每层效果都会增加其攻击频率，并为你提供1%的额外闪避几率。
text.skills.rogueSignaturePreparation.de:

向前冲锋。如果在冲锋过程中进行格挡，你就会根据你的护甲值造成伤害，并击退敌人。

当这个能量球与盟友相连时，它会治疗他们，并赋予你们双方生命链接。

§7§6[嗜血]§7现在在使用时赋予你神力。

§f（神力）§7 每层提供§a+10% §f[x]§7攻击伤害。
§7当§6[嗜血]§7处于激活状态时，你有几率在击中时移除耗竭层数。

§7当§6[嗜血]§7处于激活状态时，你有几率在击中时获得震地者效果。

§f（震地者）§7 使你在落地时对周围的敌人造成伤害并击退他们。这个伤害随你的护甲值而变化。
text.skills.berserkerSignatureBerserking:
§7
牺牲30%的总生命值。获得自我牺牲状态，持续时间等于损失的生命值。

§f（自我牺牲）§7 每次击中敌人时赋予你叠加的攻击增益效果。

§a25秒冷却时间§7
§7§6[自我牺牲]§7现在使你执行一个向前的跃击，对着陆点的敌人造成伤害并击退他们。

§7跃击现在也会对敌人施加定身效果。

§f（定身）§7 当实体试图移动时，会大幅降低速度并造成伤害。
§7跃击现在拉拽附近的敌人，而不是击退他们。

effect.simplyskills.berserking.desc: 每次击中敌人时赋予你叠加的攻击增益效果。
effect.simplyskills.bloodthirsty.desc: 每次击败一个敌人时获得相当于你最大红心百分比的红心。
effect.simplyskills.elemental_arrows.des: 使你的下一次完全充能的远程攻击向目标区域的敌人发射几支元素箭。
effect.simplyskills.evasion.desc: 有机会避开即将到来的伤害。
effect.simplyskills.rampage.desc: 每次受到伤害时赋予你随机的增益效果。
effect.simplyskills.arrow_rain.desc: 使你的下一个满蓄力的弓攻击在目标区域召唤一场箭雨。
effect.simplyskills.arcane_volley.desc: 使你快速地向目标敌人发射次级奥术箭。
effect.simplyskills.frost_volley.desc: 会让你定期对附近或目标敌人发射寒霜箭。
effect.simplyskills.meteoric_wrath.desc: 会定期在附近的敌人头上召唤流星。
effect.simplyskills.disenchantment.desc: 定期剥夺实体身上的增益效果。
effect.simplyskills.immobilize.desc: 当实体试图移动时，会大幅降低速度并造成伤害。
effect.simplyskills.immobilizing_aura.de: 会周期性地使附近的敌人陷入定身状态。
effect.simplyskills.spellbreaking_desc: 会使敌方的法术投射物在靠近你时爆炸。
effect.simplyskills.earthshaker.desc: 使你着地时对周围的敌人造成伤害和击退。
effect.simplyskills.arcane_attunement.de: 每层效果提供2%的奥术法术强度。
effect.simplyskills.soul_attunement.desc: 每层效果提供2%的灵魂法术强度。
effect.simplyskills.holy_attunement.desc: 每层效果提供2%的治疗法术强度。
effect.simplyskills.fire_attunement.desc: 每层效果提供2%的火焰法术强度。
effect.simplyskills.frost_attunement.des: 每层效果提供2%的冰霜法术强度。
effect.simplyskills.stealth.desc: 使你融入阴影中，完全避免怪物的侦测。造成或承受伤害会移除隐身效果。
effect.simplyskills.might.desc: 每层效果提供25%的近战伤害增加。
effect.simplyskills.exhaustion.desc: 每堆叠一次，你的近战攻击、移动速度和攻击速度都会降低1%。
effect.simplyskills.revealed.desc: 定期揭示附近的隐身敌人。
effect.simplyskills.barrier.desc: 你下一次受到的伤害完全无效。
effect.simplyskills.soulshock.desc: 每层可以为你提供+2灵魂和闪电法术强度。
周期性地对附近的敌人施放审判。
effect.simplyskills.consecration.desc: 神圣化你脚下的土地，对敌人造成伤害，同时治疗盟友。伤害和治疗与治疗法术强度成正比。
effect.simplyskills.taunted.desc: 被嘲讽的敌人被迫攻击嘲讽者。
effect.simplyskills.undying.desc: 充满天界能量，实体无法被杀死。 然而，如果实体在效果结束时低于60%的红心，他们将受到致命伤害。
effect.simplyskills.rage.desc: 每层提供0.5%的近战伤害、攻击速度和承受伤害增加，最多可以堆叠100层。 当狂怒堆叠超过25层时，你会迅速失去耗竭的堆叠。
effect.simplyskills.overload.desc: 每层提供75%的法术暴击伤害和10%的法术暴击几率。 当超过5层时，你会超载，对自己和附近的敌人造成大量伤害。这种伤害是根据你的最大红心和灵魂法术强度来计算的。
effect.simplyskills.bladestorm.desc: 使你周围旋转飞刀，对附近的敌人造成伤害。剑刃风暴的每层效果都会增加其攻击频率，并为你提供1%的额外闪避几率。
effect.simplyskills.anointed.desc: 使你的攻击造成范围性的神圣伤害，并周期性地治疗附近的盟友。范围伤害随治疗强度而变化。
effect.simplyskills.vitality_bond.desc: 与在持续时间内使受影响的实体的红心相等。
这也吞噬了你所有的专精知识，
item.simplyskills.gracious_manuscript.to: 并在每个专精中给予你大量
这只能在创造模式中获得。

text.autoconfig.simplyskills.title: 简单技能树
text.autoconfig.simplyskills.option.clie: Reset skill trees on death

Resets all Simply Skills skill trees upon death. 
This erases all points and experience invested.
Disable Default Puffish Skill trees

Disables the default 'Mining' & 'Combat' trees that come
packaged with Puffish Skills.
Enable build sharing

Enables players to use Skill Chronicles made
by other players.
Skill Chronicle Cooldown
The cooldown time for the Skill Chronicle item, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
Remove unlock restrictions

Allows Specialisations to be unlocked without 
pathing to them in the skill tree.
Also allows unlocking more than one specialisation.

Not recommended, except for very particular use-cases.
Spell Haste Cooldown Reduction Modifier

Controls how heavily Spell Haste impacts cooldowns.
A higher value means Spell Haste will further reduce cooldowns.
Minimum achievable cooldown (in seconds)
Limits how short a duration can be reduced to via Spell Haste.
Minimum time between ability use (in seconds)

Limits how often a client can request an ability use from the server.
 Setting this too low may allow for packet spam and impact server performance.
Enable Dynamic Damage Resistance (DDR)

Dynamic Damage resistance (DDR) is used to mitigate player powercreep in a setting
where many mods might be interacting in ways that lead to ridiculous damage numbers.

DDR works by reducing the damage an entity receives when DPS relative to their maxHP
exceeds a certain threshold.
Enable DDR Debug Log
Provides a log output of DDR analytics.
DDR Health Requirement
The max HP an entity must have in order to benefit from DDR.
DDR Health Threshold
The percent of maxHP an entity must suffer in damage in order to benefit from DDR.
DDR Amount
The base amount of damage mitigation provided by DDR (Higher is more mitigation).
DDR AttackSpeed Weight
The influence that high attack speed has on DDR (Higher is more mitigation).

text.skills.hardy.title:
§7§a[Hardy]§7
When taking damage, gain regeneration for a duration equal to the damage received.
text.skills.berserkerpath.title: Path of the §bBerserker§7
text.skills.berserkerpath.description:
§7§a[Recklessness]§7
When your HP rises above 70% you are inflicted with pulsing weakness.

Also, when dealing or receiving damage you gain a stack of Rage.

§f(Rage)§7 Grants §a+0.5% §f[x]§7 increased melee damage, attack speed, and damage taken per stack, up to a maximum of 100 stacks.
While above 25 stacks of Rage you rapidly lose stacks of Exhaustion.§7

Hold §f[SHIFT] §7for more info:
text.skills.berserkerpath.extra_descript: §7The §bBerserker§7, is driven by an insatiable thirst for destruction and a complete disregard for their own safety. They are masters of §amelee combat§7 and revel in dealing devastating damage, even if it means §aputting their own life on the line§7.
text.skills.roguePath.extra_description: §7The §bRogue§7 is a master of §astealth§7 and subterfuge. They thrive in the shadows, utilizing their exceptional skills to remain unseen and catch their enemies off guard with §aprecision strikes§7. If caught in the open, they are more than capable of §aevading§7 enemy attacks and escaping back to the safety of the shadows.
text.skills.rangerPath.extra_description: §7The §bRanger§7 is renowned for their unparalleled §aproficiency with bows§7 and their unique ability to infuse §aelemental magic§7 into their ranged attacks. They also share a deep, symbiotic bond with their §aanimal companions§7, making them a formidable force on the battlefield.
text.skills.crusaderPath.extra_descripti: §7The §bCrusader§7, is often chosen by those who are not content with merely §adefending their allies§7 but also strive to be a beacon of hope on the battlefield. They combine the fervor of a §ahealer§7 with the might of a §awarrior§7, making them formidable champions in both §aoffense and defense§7.
text.skills.spellbladePath.extra_descrip: §7The §bSpellblade§7 is a versatile and formidable warrior who seamlessly melds the power of magic with martial combat. Their hallmark is the fusion of §aspellcasting§7 and §amelee attacks§7, making them an exceptional force on the battlefield.
text.skills.wizardPath.extra_description: §7The §bWizard§7 specialization is for those who seek to harness the power of magics. They are relentless and destructive §aspellcasters§7, capable of unleashing cataclysmic magical energy upon their enemies. However, their lust for power over the arcane leads them to §aneglect their physical form§7, weakening their defences and physical offence capabilities.
text.skills.clericPath.extra_description: §7Those of the §bCleric§7 specialisation are known for their unwavering commitment to safeguarding and nurturing their allies. They possess a unique combination of §ahealing§7, §asupport§7, and the ability to §abear the burdens§7 of those they protect.
text.skills.necromancerPath.extra_descri:
§7Those of the §bNecromancer§7 specialisation partake in foul necrotic sorcery, conjuring §aundead minions§7 from flesh and bone.

Specialising in Frost & Soul Spell power, they are capable of dealing significant damage indirectly through their minions, and staving off the grasp of death itself.
text.skills.wizardSignatureIceCometDamag: §7§6[Ice Comet]§7 Is now larger and deals more damage & knockback.
text.skills.shamanSignatureNovaTotemdesc:
§7Summon a Totem that periodically casts elemental novas.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.necromancerSignatureSummonin:
§7
Perform a ritual to summon forth an undead minion.

By default, this ability summons forth a §fDreadglare§7. An airborne minion that swarms its enemies and deals melee physical damage.

Minion damage scales with your Soul Spell Power. Minions inherit a portion of your max health.

Minions expire after 120s and must be re-summoned.

§a120s Cooldown§7
text.skills.necromancerNecroticFortifica: §7Minions now inherit half of your Armor & Armor Toughness attributes.
text.skills.necromancerUndeadLegion.desc: §7Your §6[Summoning Ritual]§7 now summons one additional minion.
text.skills.necromancerSummonWraith.desc:
§7Your §6[Summoning Ritual]§7 now also has a chance to summon a §fWraith§7 minion. An airborne minion that follows you closely while casting soul spells at nearby enemies.

Spells casted by your §fWraith§7 minions count as player spellcasts and benefit from any passives that trigger from such casts.
text.skills.necromancerWitherWraiths.des: §7Your §fWraith§7 minions now inflict Wither on spell hits.
text.skills.necromancerFrostWraiths.desc: §7Your §fWraith§7 minions now inflict Slowness on spell hits.
text.skills.necromancerDeathWarden.title: §f[Death Warden]
text.skills.necromancerEnrage.title: §f[Enrage]
text.skills.ascendancyMagicCircle.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Magic Circle]§7
text.skills.ascendancyRighteousShield.de:
§7
While this ability is slotted, you generate a stack of §aGolden Aegis§7 whenever you block an attack. §aGolden Aegis§7 increases Healing Spell Power, Armor, and Armor Toughness by 1% per stack. Max 15 stacks.

Activating this ability consumes all stacks of §aGolden Aegis§7 to manifest a shield of holy energy that can be thrown for a variety of effects depending on the stacks consumed.

§7§bLess than 5 stacks:§7 The shield deals damage to enemies and ricochets 2 times.
§b5 Stacks:§7 The shield deals increased damage to enemies and ricochets 5 times.
§b10 Stacks:§7 The shield no longer damages enemies or ricochets and instead pierces and heals allies it passes through.
§b15 Stacks:§7 The shield is larger, deals significantly more damage, and inflicts Death Mark, but it no longer ricochets.§7

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Increases §aGolden Aegis§7 max stacks by 1.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
While slotted, this ability now passively generates stacks of §aGolden Aegis§7.

Damage scales with Healing Spell Power.

§a6s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyChainbreaker.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Chainbreaker]§7
text.skills.ascendancyChainbreaker.descr:
§7
Immediately cleanse yourself of all negative effects and gain Might and Marksmanship.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
+ 1 stack of Might and Marksmanship.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Now also grants you Undying.

§a35s Cooldown§7

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.
effect.simplyskills.bone_armor.desc: Grants 10% increased armor & armor toughness per bone. A bone is lost when hit
effect.simplyskills.righteous_hammers.de: Grants 2% increased melee damage per hammer and damages nearby enemies.
effect.simplyskills.shadow_aura.desc: Lashes out at nearby enemies, but drains user HP.
effect.simplyskills.focus.desc: Your next bow attack charges slower and does more damage.
text.autoconfig.simplyskills.option.clie:
Dynamic Attribute Scaling causes entities to gain increased
attributes depending on the number of players in proximity, and their cumulative invested skill points.
DAS can be used on its own, or alongside Dynamic Damage Resistance.

VALUES ARE VERY SENSITIVE!
DAS Max Health
The amount of health to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Radius
The maximum radius DAS will check for players from the entity's position.(High numbers may impact performance)
DAS Update Frequency (In Seconds)
The frequency in seconds at which DAS updates. (Lower values may impact performance)
Controls the weight each successive player has on the attribute scaling. The lower this number, the less impact each successive player will have on the scaling.
Modifies the total scaling of DAS for Passive Entities (Cows, chickens, sheep, etc). A Lower value means less scaling. Range: 0.0 -> 1.0
DAS Attack
The amount of attack to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Armor
The amount of armor to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Armor Toughness
The amount of armor toughness to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Movespeed
The amount of movespeed to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
DAS Knockback Resistance
The amount of knockback resistance to add (multiplied by skill points spent)
Connection inner color RED
The RED inner color for the connection line that renders between skill nodes. Values are RGB.
§aClient-side Render Options§7
Connection inner color GREEN
The GREEN inner color for the connection line that renders between skill nodes. Values are RGB.
Connection inner color BLUE
The BLUE inner color for the connection line that renders between skill nodes. Values are RGB.
Connection inner Alpha
The Alpha for the inner connection line that renders between skill nodes. 0.0 -> 1.0
Connection outer color RED
The RED outer color for the connection line that renders between skill nodes. Values are RGB.
Connection outer color GREEN
The GREEN outer color for the connection line that renders between skill nodes. Values are RGB.
Connection outer color BLUE
The BLUE outer color for the connection line that renders between skill nodes. Values are RGB.
Connection outer Alpha
The Alpha for the outer connection line that renders between skill nodes. 0.0 -> 1.0

text.skills.bulwarkPath.title: Path of the §bBulwark§7
text.skills.necromancerBloodHarvest.desc:
§7Your Dreadglare minions now lifesteal when attacking enemies. A portion of health stolen is also returned to you.

This effect is doubled for §fGreater Dreadglares§7.
text.skills.necromancerGreaterDreadglare:
§7Your §6[Summoning Ritual]§7 no longer summons multiple minions and instead summons a single §fGreater Dreadglare§7.

The §fGreater Dreadglare§7 gains a bonus to all attribute inheritance, taunts enemies that it hits, and gains Might on hit for each harmful effect it has.
text.skills.necromancerDeathEssence.desc:
§7Whenever a minion dies, you gain a stack of Bone Armor.

§f(Bone Armor)§7 Shield yourself in a layer of bones, granting you 10% increased Armor & Armor Toughness per bone.
Taking damage removes a layer.
text.skills.necromancerDeathWarden.descr: §7When taking damage while below 50% HP, you siphon health from nearby minions to recover.
text.skills.necromancerEnrage.descriptio: §7When one of your minions dies, all other nearby minions gain Strength & Resistance.
text.skills.necromancerWinterborn.title: §f[Winterborn]
text.skills.necromancerWinterborn.descri:
§7For every 1 Frost Spell Power you have, gain a stack of Soulshock.

§f(Soulshock)§7 grants you §a+1 §f[x]§7 Soul & Lightning spell power per stack.
text.skills.necromancerPlague.title: §f[Plague]
text.skills.necromancerPlague.descriptio: §7Any harmful effects inflicted upon you are periodically transferred to nearby minions.
text.skills.necromancerPestilence.title: §f[Pestilence]
text.skills.necromancerPestilence.descri: §7When your minions perform a melee attack, they transfer one harmful effect from themselves to their target.
text.skills.necromancerDelightfulSufferi:
§7When casting spells, §cyou are inflicted with harmful effects§7.

Your summon limit is also increased by 1.
text.skills.necromancerShadowAura.title: §f[Shadow Aura]
text.skills.necromancerShadowAura.descri:
§7Your minions gain Shadow Aura. An effect that causes shadows to lash out and deal Soul damage to nearby targets, but also §cdrains the minion's health§7.

This effect is tripled for §fGreater Dreadglares§7.
text.skills.necromancerShadowCombust.des:
§7When your minions die they combust in a shadowy explosion, dealing significant Soul damage to nearby targets.

This effect is doubled for §fGreater Dreadglares§7
§7When your minions die they have a 20% chance to re-summon themselves.

This chance is increased by 5% per harmful status effect on your minion at the time of its demise.
Maximum 60% chance.
text.skills.necromancerWraithLegion.desc:
§7Remove Dreadglares from your summoning pool, allowing you to summon only Wraiths.

Your summon limit is also increased by 1.

In addition, your §fWraith§7 spell casts have a 5% chance per harmful effect on themselves to inflict the target with Agony.

§f(Agony)§7 causes an entity to take additional damage every time they are hit with a spell projectile.
text.skills.ascendancyRighteousHammers.d:
§7
Summon hammers that orbit you for a duration, dealing melee damage to nearby enemies and granting you 2% increased melee attack per hammer.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Summon one additional hammer.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Periodically create additional hammers that seek out and strike nearby targets.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyBoneArmor.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Bone Armor]§7
text.skills.ascendancyBoneArmor.descript:
§7
Shield yourself in a layer of bones, granting you 10% increased Armor & Armor Toughness per bone.
Taking damage removes a layer.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Summon one additional bone.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
When your last layer of Bone Armor is removed, gain Undying and Regeneration for 8s.

§a90s Cooldown§7

§f(Undying)§7 Infused with celestial energy, the entity cannot be killed.
However, if the entity is below 60% HP when the effect ends, they will take fatal damage.
text.skills.ascendancyCyclonicCleave.des:
§7
Violently swing your weapon around yourself while moving forward, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
This attack scales with the highest of your attack, ranged, or spell attributes.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases ability damage.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Cyclonic Cleave now pulls enemies it hits toward you.

§a25s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyMagicCircle.descri:
§7
Immobilize yourself in order to summon a magic circle beneath your feet, granting you a 30% increase to all Spell Power for 6s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Magic Circle now also grants you Wizard's Spell Echo passive.
If you already have Spell Echo unlocked, increase its chance to occur by 10%.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyArcaneSlash.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Arcane Slash]§7
text.skills.ascendancyArcaneSlash.descri:
§7
Focus arcane energy into your blade and perform a forward slash, releasing an arcane projectile that pierces up to 5 targets.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Gain +1 stack of Arcane Attunement on use.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Arcane Slash is now larger, deals more damage, and pierces up to 10 targets.

§a16s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyAgony.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Agony]§7
text.skills.ascendancyAgony.description:
§7
Curse the nearest enemy with Agony, causing them to take additional damage every time they are hit with a spell projectile.
Lasts 8s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
When Agony triggers, it also heals the spell caster that caused the trigger.
This healing scales with your Healing Spell Power.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyTorment.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Torment]§7
text.skills.ascendancyTorment.descriptio:
§7
Curse the nearest enemy with Torment.
While tormented, all damage the enemy would deal to you is instead redirected to them.
Lasts 8s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
In addition to tormenting your enemy, you also taunt them.

§a60s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyRapidfire.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Rapidfire]§7
text.skills.ascendancyRapidfire.descript:
§7
Enter a firing stance and let loose a flurry of arrows.
You can move freely while in this stance, but you cannot take other actions.
Requires a Bow or Crossbow in mainhand.
Lasts 6s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases effect duration.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Every third arrow fired now grants you a stack of Marksmanship.

§a30s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyCataclysm.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Cataclysm]§7
text.skills.ascendancyCataclysm.descript:
§7
Lock yourself in place to channel a powerful spell that causes several comets to descend along a line in front of you.

Scales with the highest of your Frost or Fire spell power attributes.
Lasts 3.5s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases comet frequency, allowing for more comets per cast.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
For every comet summoned, gain a stack of Spellforged.

§a70s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancyGhostwalk.title: Ascendancy Ability: §6[Ghostwalk]§7
text.skills.ascendancyGhostwalk.descript:
§7
Enter a spectral form and project yourself forward, becoming invulnerable to damage and sending souls to attack nearby enemies. 

Damage scales with Soul spell power.
Lasts 3.0s.

§6[For every 10 Ascendancy]§7
Gain +1 stack of Soulshock on use.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
You now heal for half of the damage dealt by Ghostwalk.

§a45s Cooldown§7
text.skills.ascendancySkywardSunder.desc:
§7
Gain a stack of Barrier per stack of Might on you and charge forward, knocking back enemies and performing an upward strike, launching both you and your targets into the air before slamming them back into the ground.

This attack scales with the highest of your attack, ranged, or spell attributes.
Lasts 3.0s.

§6[For every 1 Ascendancy]§7
Increases ability damage.

§6[At 30+ Ascendancy]§7
Skyward Sunder now inflicts enemies hit during the charging phase with Deathmark.

§a16s Cooldown§7
